name: Method
description: The Method class describes the tactics, techniques, procedures, or weakness used by the threat actor in an incident.  This class consists of both a list of references describing the attack methods and weaknesses and a free-form text description.

Reference.name: Reference
Reference.description: A reference to a vulnerability, malware sample, advisory, or analysis of an attack technique.  See Section 3.11.1.

Description.name: Description
Description.description: A free-form text description of techniques, tactics, or procedures used by the threat actor.

aggregates.description: A reference to the exploited weakness per [RFC7203].

AdditionalData.name: AdditionalData
AdditionalData.description: A mechanism by which to extend the data model.

ext-restriction.name: ext-restriction
ext-restriction.description: A means by which to extend the restriction attribute.  See Section 5.1.1.
